alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 500 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Village Of Golf, or near Boynton Beach, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Wellington, Lake Worth, Greenacres, Palm Springs, Lantana, Atlantis, Village Of Golf, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Loxahatchee NWR, Aberdeen, Lake Worth Corridor, Aberdeen Golf Course, Morikami Park, Florida Gardens, Seminole Manor and Villages Of Oriole. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
